page.title: 18Problems for a Local Doctor
page.content:
In{Seaton}there are 30 old peoples homes,these are needed because in every 100 patients, 36 are over 65 and 17 are over 75. This means the doctors have to work very hard making about 5_20 home visits a day and 70 night calls a year, because many of the old are unable to leave their homes.
Unlike most doctors, Seaton doctors see more patients in the summer because in every 10 weeks 2,000 holiday makers go for treatment.
They have to deal with at least 2 serious farm accidents a year.This is mainly due to the steep land.
